channel.title: Npc bug/glitch pi
channel.description:
ok so when yout fighting a npc and u hit a 0 its hp goes down? im wearing or useing no stat enhanceing items or potions of any kind it does it with all armor wepons and even punching... anyone have clue why or know files i should look in to maybe find this glitch thanks.. pi base acutally base name is hybridz pvp
if u think u can fix this add me on yahoo or msn thedarktwinkie@yahoo.com we will work something out
